about-me.title: About me
about-me.content:
Hello! I'm Luis, a Junior Developer.
My primary focus is web development, with a special inclination towards frontend, although I also have knowledge in backend.
My favorite technologies for development are HTML, CSS, and React.
I love to learn new technologies and stay updated with the latest advancements.
Some of my hobbies include reading, outdoor activities, and sports.
about-me.title-item2:
Institute Alfredo Coviello(2017-2021)
Higher technician in business administration

projects.title: Projects
projects.sub-title2: If you can imagine it you can program it.
projects.content-layer1: This app was born as a job opportunity, for a close client. I'm still working on it with the styles and adding some functionality to them. It is an electronics e-commerce with a shopping cart and purchase form.
projects.content-layer2: This app was developed as a group, to present as the final project of the RollingCode course. I was in charge of doing the back, and the connection with the front. This is an app for a fast food restaurant.
projects.content-layer3: My web portfolio, where I detail my skills and knowledge and you can contact me.
